sections.heading: meeting; qualifications of electors
sections.text: No person shall be a voter at any town meeting unless he shall be a registered voter, and a resident of the town wherein he shall offer to vote.SourceLaws 1895, c. 28, § 36, p. 142;R.S.1913, § 1022;C.S.1922, § 924;C.S.1929, § 26-238;R.S.1943, § 23-238;Laws 1973, L
